fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Capgemini provides EU Policy Advice Consulting- and Technology Services to the EU institutions, mainly the European Commission and also to agencies and the European Parliament. Specifically Capgemini Consulting has conducted policy studies for DG Connect and DG Growth in the field of the Digital Single Markets. Subject areas covered are E-Government, E-Skills, Open Data, Cybersecurity, Accessibility and Digital Entrepreneurship.
goals__remit: A global leader in consulting, technology services and digital transformation, Capgemini is at the forefront of innovation to address the entire breadth of clients’ opportunities in the evolving world of cloud, digital and platforms. Building on its strong 50-year heritage and deep industry-specific expertise, Capgemini enables organizations to realize their business ambitions through an array of services from strategy to operations. Capgemini is driven by the conviction that the business value of technology comes from and through people. It is a multicultural company of 200,000 team members in over 40 countries.
relevant_communication: Capgemini Consulting has conducted policy studies for DG Connect and DG Growth in the field of the Digital Single Markets. Subject areas covered are E-Government, E-Skills, Open Data, Cybersecurity, Accessibility and Digital Entrepreneurship.
